name: Dragon Ball Z Super Butoden (itch)
description:
THE LEGEND OF DRAGON BALL Z HAS ARRIVED FOR X-STATION.

Dragon Ball Z Super Butoden has arrived for the X-Station. This is pretty much a clone of Dragon Ball Z Super Butoden from the Super Famicom. It's a fighting game where you can battle against your favorite DBZ heroes and villians. Play as Goku, Vegeta, Trunks or even Freiza and Cell. Perform famous super moves and explosion attacks. If you love Dragon Ball Z and 16-bit fighting games then this game is for you.
